full_summary:
**Deep-Sea Drop Camera Technical Support Services for Offshore Research**
=====================================================

### Notice Information
--------------------------------

*   Reference Number: PW-23-01030194
*   Solicitation Number: 30003616
*   Publication Date: 2023-03-16
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-20T13:00:00
*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

### Description
-------------

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is soliciting a Standing Offer contract for technical support services to deploy and operate a deep-sea drop camera for offshore research at sea. The services required involve the provision of technical expertise, including electronic and mechanical wiring, to support the drop camera during its field data collection, as well as assistance in mobilization and demobilization of the equipment from Canadian Coast Guard ships to DFO facilities.

### Objectives
------------

*   Deploy and operate the deep-sea drop camera during offshore research at sea.
*   Provide technical support services to assist with troubleshooting and repairs during the survey.
*   Deliver a final report on the current state of the camera, outlining any future repairs needed.

### Requirements
--------------

The services required involve the following tasks:

*   Testing and Commissioning: Ensure that the drop camera and associated peripherals are in good working condition before deployment.
*   Drop Camera Operation: Deploy and operate the drop camera, including setting up the surface computers and conducting on-deck testing before each deployment.
*   Data Collection and Troubleshooting: Collect and process data from the drop camera, and troubleshoot any errors or issues that may arise during the survey.
*   Demobilization: Assist with demobilization of the drop camera and equipment after the survey.

### Evaluation Criteria
----------------------

The contractor's proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

*   Technical expertise and experience in deploying and operating deep-sea drop cameras.
*   Ability to provide technical support services during the survey.
*   Quality of the final report to be delivered at the end of the survey.

### Contract Period
----------------

The Standing Offer contract will be valid for a period of one (1) year, with an option to renew for an additional one (1) year.
